Wavewalker: Breaking Free is an upcoming television series adapted by Jack Thorne from Wavewalker: A Memoir of Breaking Free by Suzanne Heywood, and starring James Norton.
Cast
* James Norton
Production
The series is adapted by screenwriter Jack Thorne from the Suzanne Heywood memoir. Rabbit Track Pictures are producers of the television adaptation. James Norton was announced in a starring and producing role in March 2025.
